While `plant` is under heavy development we have opted not to include
vignettes directly in the package.  They also take considerably longer
to run (several hours) than is typical or ideal for an R package.

In the meantime, they are available on the `traitecoevo/plant_paper`
[wiki](https://github.com/traitecoevo/plant_paper/wiki).

Details of the modelling approaches:

* [Modelling demography of plants, patches and metapopulations](physiology.pdf)
* [Plant physiological model](demography.pdf)

Details of using `plant` from R:

* [Plant level properties](https://github.com/traitecoevo/plant_paper/wiki/plant) ([source](https://github.com/traitecoevo/plant_paper/blob/master/vignettes/src/plant.R))
* [Cohort spacing algorithm](https://github.com/traitecoevo/plant_paper/wiki/cohort_spacing) ([source](https://github.com/traitecoevo/plant_paper/blob/master/vignettes/src/cohort_spacing.R))
* [Finding demographic equilibrium](https://github.com/traitecoevo/plant_paper/wiki/equilibrium) ([source](https://github.com/traitecoevo/plant_paper/blob/master/vignettes/src/equilibrium.R))
* [Patch level dynamics](https://github.com/traitecoevo/plant_paper/wiki/patch) ([source](https://github.com/traitecoevo/plant_paper/blob/master/vignettes/src/patch.R))
* [Patch level emergent properties](https://github.com/traitecoevo/plant_paper/wiki/emergent) ([source](https://github.com/traitecoevo/plant_paper/blob/master/vignettes/src/emergent.R))
* [Calculating fitness](https://github.com/traitecoevo/plant_paper/wiki/fitness) ([source](https://github.com/traitecoevo/plant_paper/blob/master/vignettes/src/fitness.R))
* [Modifying parameters of the physiological model](https://github.com/traitecoevo/plant_paper/wiki/parameters) ([source](https://github.com/traitecoevo/plant_paper/blob/master/vignettes/src/parameters.R))
